name: StickHunter
description:
-Simple contrl with single finger
-Hiding and shooting and experience the thrill of killing with full screen
-10 insane weapons to kill metamorphic boss
-Combine skills to make adventures full of novelty
-Idle laboratory, research magical Buff to strengthen your abilities!
-Cultivate the strongest shooter with upgrade talent
-Unlock super elves, no longer lonely on the adventure
